amendment.description: To make funds available for regional coastal disaster assistance, transition, and recovery programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3314 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3314 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Sununu. (consideration: CR S12913-12914, S12916; text: CR S12913) To make funds available for regional coastal disaster assistance, transition, and recovery programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3314 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3314 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Sununu.
